name: CorFire
tag_list: mobile-payments, mobile-commerce, mcommerce, mobile-wallet, google-wallet, nfc, near-field-communication, tsm, mobile-technology-solution
overview:
CorFire™ is a pioneer and a leading industry expert in the global mobile commerce arena.

It offers mobile commerce technology solutions to mobile network operators (MNOs), financial institutions, card issuers, and retailers to bring mCommerce visions to reality. As the mobile commerce business unit of SK C&C, USA, it has the billion-dollar financial backing of its parent company, SK C&C, with more than 10 years of experience in delivering mobile commerce solutions in South Korea. Today, CorFire is the only technical provider for all of SK’s mobile commerce transactions in South Korea with nearly 30 million consumers using its mobile platform on a daily basis.

The three main technology solutions offered by CorFire are CorTSM™ - its Trusted Services Manager, CorPay™ - a robust mobile wallet platform, and Cor360- a suite of mobile marketing services. In a partnership with First Data Corporation (FDC), CorFire powers the TSM technology used in the Google Wallet, which makes CorTSM the first and only live commercial TSM in North America to date. CorTSM enables secure provisioning of account data into the Secure Element, allowing users of the Google Wallet to make secure payments on their mobile devices using the Near Field Communication (NFC) technology. The company is also a strategic partner of the U.S. prepaid card leader, InComm, and offers merchant-branded wallet solutions to national merchants and retailers. Through its CorPay and Cor360 platforms, CorFire provides merchant-focused solutions for mobile payments, gifting, couponing, loyalty, and other marketing services.

CorFire™ is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia and has a second office in San Francisco.
